---
title: "Before and After Roe: Tracing Partisan Polarization and the Shifting Landscape of Congressional Discourse on Abortion (Poster)"
author: "Justine Shakespeare"
date: "12/06/2023"
---

Poster for final project for Text as Data class. Implemented sentiment analysis and structural topic modeling (STM) on Congressional Records to assess shifts in legislative discourse on abortion following the Supreme Court's Roe v. Wade decision.
